title: 服务器崩溃救命
txt_content:
今天装了神秘时代mod重启服务器然后无限崩溃
不要说前置模组我装了但是每次装进去启动完服务器就会自动没掉QAQ

↓崩溃报道↓

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

Time: 8/15/15 12:12 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

Missing Mods:
        Baubles : [1.0.1.10,)

cpw.mods.fml.common.MissingModsException
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.sortModList(Loader.java:241)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.loadMods(Loader.java:491)
        at cpw.mods.fml.server.FMLServerHandler.beginServerLoading(FMLServerHandler.java:87)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onServerStart(FMLCommonHandler.java:318)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:176)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:620)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.10
        Operating System: Linux (amd64) version 3.13.0-55-generic
        Java Version: 1.7.0_72, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 268167272 bytes (255 MB) / 396886016 bytes (378 MB) up to 4205838336 bytes (4011 MB)
        JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xmx4096M -Xms256M -XX:MaxNewSize=256m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: MCP v9.05 FML v7.10.114.1388 Minecraft Forge 10.13.3.1403 8 mods loaded, 8 mods active
        mcp{9.05} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded
        FML{7.10.114.1388} [Forge Mod Loader] (mcpc-plus-1.7.10.jar) Unloaded
        Forge{10.13.3.1403} [Minecraft Forge] (mcpc-plus-1.7.10.jar) Unloaded
        AnnoReg{1.0beta3} [Annotation Registry] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded
        academy-craft{1.0beta3r1} [Academy Craft] (AcademyCraft-1.0beta3r1.jar) Unloaded
        LIUtils{1.7.10.100} [LIUtils] (LambdaLib-1.0beta3.jar) Unloaded
        customnpcs{1.7.10d} [CustomNpcs] (NPC.jar) Unloaded
        Thaumcraft{4.2.3.5} [Thaumcraft] (Thaumcraft.jar) Unloaded
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Is Modded: Definitely; Server brand changed to 'cauldron,craftbukkit,mcpc,fml,forge'
        Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content: 缺少神秘mod的前置mod Baubles，Baubles一般安装在mods里面一个以mc版本为名的文件夹里，所以经常会出现把客户端的联机mod转移到服务端的时候经常漏掉这些前置mod的情况

sanityko 发表于 2015-8-15 13:01
缺少神秘mod的前置mod Baubles，Baubles一般安装在mods里面一个以mc版本为名的文件夹里，所以经常会出现把 ...
有装但是每次开服前置mod就会消失啊。

sanityko 发表于 2015-8-15 13:01
缺少神秘mod的前置mod Baubles，Baubles一般安装在mods里面一个以mc版本为名的文件夹里，所以经常会出现把 ...
注意到了装在1.7.10的文件夹里
